name: revolve_e_noid
description:
This was made for the One Minute Game jam #4 and was immediately thought of when the theme "destroy" was revealed. It was super fun to make, and I hope you enjoy playing it!

Let me know what your best times are!

I know it's just a silly game jam game, but please consider donating as I am currently between jobs, BUT don't feel obligated to do so! Also check out some of my other short works on my page.

Controls:

A & D to rotate

Known bugs:

  • Ball will seemingly phase through the wall (rare)
  • Tiles display shows the current format on startup but only displays the number during gameplay (everytime)

I may try to fix any reported bugs but don't expect many fixes after the jam ends.
